513500.name: Street Legal Racing: Redline - High Quality Cars Pack
513500.description:
This pack adds high-quality versions of 9 cars to your Street Legal Racing: Redline:


  • Baiern CoupeSport/DevilSport (including CoupeSport DTM)
  • Emer Nonus (including Nonus DTM)
  • Einvagen 100 Series (including 140DTM)
  • MCA MC GT
  • PFAA Prime DLH
  • Hauler's SuperDuty
  • Ishima Enula
  • Shimutshibu Focer
  • Duhen SunStrip

We have redesigned both exterior and interior, remodelled all meshes in high quality and repainted all textures for these vehicles. This DLC works as add-on, so you can use both old and new cars. If you want to disable this DLC in game, just uninstall it from Steam - game will stop caching it automatically.

There are bonus paintjobs included into this pack as well:

  • baiern_dtm
  • nonus_dtm
  • focer_wrc

Use "LOAD PAINTJOB" button in paint booth to load them.
